description:
At the beginning of the 3rd match-up in the 3-on-3 battle against Ash, it was revealed that Sawyer`s Grovyle had evolved into Sawyer`s Sceptile.
 It was revealed in the quarter-final match of the Kalos League against Tierno that Sawyer`s Sceptile could mega evolve. It`s mega evolved forms Ability is Lightning Rod which nullifies Electric moves like Thunder.
name: Jukain (Shouta)
